set_1.definitions: An outlying district of a city, especially a residential one.
set_1.notes: Suburbs are typically quieter than the inner city.

set_1.definitions: Having a sharply strong taste or smell.
set_1.notes: Pungent odors are often associated with spices or strong chemicals.

set_1.definitions: A short journey undertaken in order to deliver or collect something.
set_1.notes: Errands are typically quick tasks like going to the store or picking up mail.

set_1.definitions: Allow oneself to enjoy the pleasure of something.
set_1.notes: Indulging is often linked to treating oneself to something enjoyable, like food or rest.

set_1.definitions: Not damaged or impaired in any way; complete.
set_1.notes: Intact is used to describe something that is whole and unharmed.
